news.title: Darton Archery Sign’s Sponsorship Agreement With The Bear Whisperer
news.story: After many years of looking for the perfect bow, Blaine Anthony, producer and host of the Bear Whisperer TV show, seems to have finally found a home with Darton Archery.

news.title: Horton Vortec RDX Feature Reverse Draw Technology, Easy Assembly
news.story: Horton Crossbow Innovations’ unveiled its brand new Vortec RDX crossbow model at the 2017 ATA Show in Indianapolis, Indiana.

news.title: Centerpoint Archery Expands Best-Selling, Award Winning Sniper Series
news.story: Building on the success of the Sniper Crossbow, Centerpoint is now introducing an expanded package with even more value and performance at an extreme value.

news.title: ATA Chooses Matt Kormann as President/CEO
news.story: The Archery Trade Association has chosen Matt Kormann of Marietta, Georgia, as its next president/CEO after a nationwide executive search.

news.title: Carbon Express Releaves Their New PileDriver 390 Crossbow
news.story: When it comes to hunting with a crossbow, there’s no substitute for speed, as long as comfort, accuracy and shootability are not sacrificed in the process.

news.title: Gold Tip, Bee Stinger Shooter Wins Para-World Championship in Beijing
news.story: Gold Tip and Bee Stinger Paralympic shooter Jeff Fabry recently won the 2017 World Archery Para Championships in Beijing, China.

news.title: TenPoint Introduces Highly Efficient, Ultra-Light Eclipse RCX Crossbow
news.story: TenPoint Crossbow Technologies’ introduced its new Eclipse RCX crossbow, their latest response to consumer preference for lighter, faster crossbows.

news.title: Browning Crossbows Expands Line in 2017
news.story: The new OneSevenOne crossbow is the culmination of years of design and development.

news.title: Bloodsport: Choosing Arrows and Broadheads has Never Been Easier
news.story: New Bloodsport website makes hunting for information on arrows and broadheads fast and easy.
